meepo_geostrike_Lore: Keeping your pack light and having few but versatile tools is the best bet for survival.
clinkz_death_pact_Note0: If the target is an enemy, Clinkz will gain the correct experience and gold.
sven_gods_strength_aghanim_description: God's Strength grants bonus damage to allies in a 900 radius.
doom_bringer_doom_Description:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
undying_tombstone_Lore: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence_Description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura_Description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
batrider_firefly_Lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
bristleback_bristleback_Description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes %quill_release_threshold% damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova_Description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
ogre_magi_fireblast_Description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
ogre_magi_bloodlust_Note0: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 575 area of effect to receive Bloodlust.
furion_wrath_of_nature_Lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
ancient_apparition_cold_feet_Description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
invoker_sun_strike_Note1: Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.
spectre_desolate_Description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy who is alone.
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence_Lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
pudge_rot_Note3: Pudge can deny himself with this ability.
axe_counter_helix_Lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist_Note1: A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds.
jakiro_macropyre_Description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
witch_doctor_death_ward_Note2: Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
bane_fiends_grip_Lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
earth_spirit_magnetize_Lore: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.
chaos_knight_chaos_strike_Lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot_Note2: Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.
mirana_starfall_aghanim_description: Passively triggers Starstorm every 10 seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.
enchantress_enchant_Lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
lion_finger_of_death_Description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
spectre_spectral_dagger_Note0: There is a 2 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.
warlock_upheaval_Note0: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.
weaver_geminate_attack_Description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
slark_shadow_dance_Note1: The passive movement and health regeneration bonuses have a 0.5 second activation and deactivation delay.
invoker_ghost_walk_Note0: The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.
lina_dragon_slave_Description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
venomancer_poison_sting_Note1: Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.
earthshaker_enchant_totem_Description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
life_stealer_infest_Note0: If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.
legion_commander_overwhelming_odds_Lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
invoker_exort_Description: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Each <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instance provides increased attack damage.
shadow_shaman_voodoo_Note1: The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
centaur_khan_war_stomp_Description: The Centaur Conqueror's powerful hooves stomp the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Heroes recover more quickly.
lone_druid_true_form_Lore: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.
abaddon_borrowed_time_aghanim_descriptio: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, a percentage of all damage taken by allied Heroes in a radius will be redirected to Abaddon.
nyx_assassin_mana_burn_Lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
lone_druid_savage_roar_Description: Lone Druid roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_aghanim_des: Song of the Siren regenerates all nearby allies for 10% of their health per second.
enchantress_impetus_Lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
necrolyte_death_pulse_Lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
terrorblade_sunder_Description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
legion_commander_duel_Lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
legion_commander_press_the_attack_Lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
dark_seer_ion_shell_Description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
huskar_life_break_Note0: If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike_aghanim_des: Causes the Greater Bash to hit an area around the initial target, decreases cooldown, and increases cast range.
techies_stasis_trap_Note1: Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.
beastmaster_greater_boar_poison_Descript: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.
enchantress_natures_attendants_Lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
lich_dark_ritual_Lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
wisp_spirits_in_Description: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_Description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers %backlash_damage%%% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn_Note2: Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to 0.1.
batrider_sticky_napalm_Note0: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.
antimage_mana_break_Lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
ember_spirit_searing_chains_Lore: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
visage_soul_assumption_Lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike_Descript: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade_aghanim_descrip: Increases duration and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.
lone_druid_savage_roar_Note0: An entangled hero will not be able to move.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe_Description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have %respawn_constant% seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
riki_blink_strike_Note0: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
winter_wyvern_winters_curse_Description: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies.
omniknight_degen_aura_Lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
lone_druid_savage_roar_Lore: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.
life_stealer_rage_Note0: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.
winter_wyvern_cold_embrace_Lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
ember_spirit_searing_chains_Note0: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
lina_fiery_soul_Lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
razor_unstable_current_Lore: Attacking the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.
slark_shadow_dance_Description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration_Note0: Healing is done in 0.33 second intervals.
meepo_earthbind_Note1: Does not work on Spell Immune units or Roshan.
lion_impale_Description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_entangle_Descript: Attacks have a chance to cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the attacked enemy unit, and dealing damage per second.
bane_nightmare_Description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch_Lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his allies.
monkey_king_primal_spring_Lore: Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.
magnataur_reverse_polarity_Lore: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
life_stealer_feast_Note2: The heal is independent of the damage.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth_Lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
silencer_last_word_Note0: Channeling abilities will trigger this effect once the caster finishes its channel.
abyssal_underlord_firestorm_Lore: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.
skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt_Lore: Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.
elder_titan_natural_order_Description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
life_stealer_infest_Lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
templar_assassin_meld_Lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
queenofpain_blink_Note0: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
bane_fiends_grip_Note0: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
drow_ranger_frost_arrows_Lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
undying_flesh_golem_Note3: The minimum damage amplification and move slow from Plague Aura is 1%.
death_prophet_exorcism_Description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.
winter_wyvern_winters_curse_Lore: The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
bloodseeker_thirst_Note1: Max movement speed and attack damage bonuses occur when an enemy's health is at or below 25%.
mirana_invis_Lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
templar_assassin_meld_Note1: Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.
razor_unstable_current_Note1: Only activates if the caster is a hero unit.
slark_essence_shift_Note1: Essence Shifted stats are returned to normal on death. The stat return for Slark and for the affected hero are separate.
monkey_king_jingu_mastery_Lore: Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage_Description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.
centaur_double_edge_Description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
kunkka_ghostship_aghanim_description: Drags enemies with the Ghostship towards the crash site. Enemies are still able to perform actions while being dragged.
witch_doctor_death_ward_Description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within 700 range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
phoenix_icarus_dive_Description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot_Lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
bounty_hunter_track_Note0: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died.
bristleback_warpath_Lore: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
sniper_assassinate_Description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after %total_cast_time_tooltip% seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
slark_pounce_Note2: Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location.
death_prophet_spirit_siphon_Note0: Cannot cast multiple on same target.
spectre_spectral_dagger_Description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
huskar_life_break_Note1: Slow works on Spell Immune units.
phoenix_fire_spirits_Note0: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment_N: Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.
leshrac_lightning_storm_Lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.
witch_doctor_death_ward_aghanim_descript: Death Ward attacks bounce between nearby enemies.
brewmaster_drunken_brawler_Lore: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.
tusk_frozen_sigil_Description: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.
invoker_sun_strike_Note0: Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
tinker_heat_seeking_missile_Lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike_Description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
kunkka_torrent_Note0: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies.
clinkz_wind_walk_Note0: Will not break most channeling of spells or items upon activation.
techies_minefield_sign_aghanim_descripti: Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.
sven_great_cleave_Note2: The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.
sven_warcry_Description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.
sniper_assassinate_aghanim_description: Turns Assassinate into a ground target AoE ability, that after the channel period launches a critical strike and procs headshot on units in the AoE. Only affects visible heroes.
drow_ranger_silence_Description: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
bristleback_warpath_Description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
witch_doctor_maledict_Note0: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.
tidehunter_ravage_Description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
lone_druid_true_form_Note0: You can dodge stuns during the 2 second duration of transforming.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_Lore: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
mirana_starfall_Note2: Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.
doom_bringer_doom_aghanim_description: Increases Doom's duration, and will suspend its duration while the affected unit is within 900 range. Also causes it to remove positive buffs from the target when cast, and break most passive abilities while active.
razor_unstable_current_Description: Razor moves with increased speed, and any abilities targeted at him are instantly countered with a jolt of electricity which damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
centaur_stampede_Lore: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.
storm_spirit_electric_vortex_Description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50%% for 3 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
earthshaker_aftershock_Note0: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.
razor_static_link_Lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
vengefulspirit_command_aura_Note0: The bonus damage provided by the aura is based on base damage and primary attribute.
keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic_Descrip: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.
beastmaster_primal_roar_aghanim_descript: Reduces cooldown, and increases cast range.
riki_permanent_invisibility_Note2: Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.
sniper_shrapnel_Note2: Provides vision in the targeted area.
magnataur_empower_Note2: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
ember_spirit_flame_guard_Description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
queenofpain_sonic_wave_Note0: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward_Lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
medusa_stone_gaze_Description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100%% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.
enchantress_natures_attendants_Descripti: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 11 seconds.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison_Lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
alchemist_goblins_greed_Description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next %duration% seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield %bounty_multiplier_tooltip% times their normal gold.
chen_holy_persuasion_aghanim_description: Holy Persuasion can target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings_Lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb_Note0: The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.
elder_titan_echo_stomp_spirit_Descriptio: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.
slark_essence_shift_Lore: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
windrunner_focusfire_aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown, decreases damage reduction, and removes penalty from Unique Attack Modifiers and item effects.
keeper_of_the_light_recall_Note0: If Keeper of the Light dies, the spell effect is interrupted.
alchemist_goblins_greed_Lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger_Note0: If an attack effect is chance-based, the chance of its application will be the same as its chance to occur.
abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura_Descripti: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If a unit dies while under this effect, Underlord gains bonus damage.
troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged_Descr: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
centaur_hoof_stomp_Description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
zuus_arc_lightning_Description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
bane_nightmare_Note3: Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.
rattletrap_battery_assault_Description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
nyx_assassin_vendetta_Description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
phoenix_sun_ray_toggle_move_Description: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.
silencer_global_silence_Description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
spirit_breaker_greater_bash_Description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.
undying_tombstone_Note2: If their initial target dies or goes out of vision, the Zombie will die.
warlock_shadow_word_Description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
polar_furbolg_ursa_warrior_thunder_clap_: The Hellbear Smasher claps his massive hands together, creating a deafening blast. The blast damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing.
batrider_firefly_Note1: If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck.
templar_assassin_meld_Description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for %armor_reduction_duration_tooltip% seconds.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_release_Des: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.
techies_land_mines_Description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active %radius% AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for %proximity_threshold% seconds. The explosion deals full damage in the blast radius, and deals %building_damage_pct%%% damage to buildings.
antimage_blink_Lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
ember_spirit_fire_remnant_Note1: Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk_Note1: Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
spirit_breaker_empowering_haste_Lore: Aspiring heroes gain speed and power from simply observing the Spirit Breaker's dominance on the battle field.
furion_force_of_nature_Lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
venomancer_venomous_gale_Note0: Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
tusk_snowball_Note2: Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
jakiro_ice_path_Note0: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.
mirana_arrow_Note1: Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
kunkka_tidebringer_Description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
faceless_void_time_dilation_Description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for %duration% seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by %slow%%% for each cooldown frozen.
sniper_shrapnel_Description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %charge_restore_time% seconds.
morphling_adaptive_strike_Description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50%% higher than strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his strength is 50%% higher than his agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field_Note0: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second).
viper_viper_strike_Lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
oracle_false_promise_Lore: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
beastmaster_wild_axes_Lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
undying_soul_rip_Note0: Can heal Tombstone, but can't heal or damage other buildings.
storm_spirit_static_remnant_Note0: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast.
puck_illusory_orb_Note0: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
rubick_spell_steal_Description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
undying_soul_rip_Note1: Does not rip from invisible units.
venomancer_venomous_gale_Note1: Duration damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
jakiro_dual_breath_Lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
techies_suicide_Description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and silence enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies damage equal to 50% of their max health.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings_Note0: If the target is killed within 2 seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.
luna_lucent_beam_Description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
legion_commander_duel_aghanim_descriptio: Increases Duel duration and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take damage from each other.
drow_ranger_silence_Lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
invoker_cold_snap_Note0: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than 10 after reductions.
shadow_demon_soul_catcher_Description: Curses a random enemy in an area to take increased damage.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.
juggernaut_omni_slash_Note3: Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash.
skeleton_king_reincarnation_Note4: Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
techies_focused_detonate_Lore: Why light one fuse when you can light them all?
templar_assassin_trap_Description: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk_Note1: The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
sven_great_cleave_Note0: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova_Lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot_Lore: Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.
crystal_maiden_frostbite_Note0: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite.
death_prophet_exorcism_Note1: Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
lone_druid_savage_roar_bear_Note0: An entangled hero will not be able to move.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk_Lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura_Descripti: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.
sniper_shrapnel_Note0: Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.
lycan_feral_impulse_Description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.
rubick_null_field_Lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
earth_spirit_boulder_smash_Lore: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.
beastmaster_primal_roar_Note0: The stun will hit Spell Immune units. The damage will not.
tusk_snowball_Lore: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
riki_blink_strike_Lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
puck_phase_shift_Note0: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace_Note0: The damage is calculated after all reductions.
puck_phase_shift_Description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage_Lore: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain_Note0: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light_Descr: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.
kunkka_ghostship_Lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
tusk_walrus_punch_Note0: Works fully on Spell Immune units.
rattletrap_hookshot_Note1: Hookshot's pull and stun pierce magic immunity. The damage does not.
tusk_frozen_sigil_Note0: If no order is given, the Sigil will follow Tusk.
medusa_mana_shield_Note0: Absorbs damage before any damage reduction takes place, meaning that armor will not reduce the amount of mana needed to absorb damage.
mirana_starfall_Description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a %dstarfall_secondary_radius% radius will be struck a second time for 75%% of the damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
naga_siren_mirror_image_Note1: Upon casting, most effects are removed from Naga Siren.
lion_impale_Note0: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.
techies_suicide_Note0: Dying from this ability counts as suicide, and does not award gold or experience to the enemy team.
earth_spirit_stone_caller_Lore: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.
ember_spirit_fire_remnant_Description: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every %dcharge_restore_time% seconds, with a max of %max_charges% charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
dazzle_shallow_grave_Lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
monkey_king_boundless_strike_Description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
enchantress_untouchable_Note0: All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed.
axe_culling_blade_Lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
batrider_sticky_napalm_Description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.
obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura_Descript: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.
morphling_replicate_Description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing %tooltip_illusion_damage_out_pct%%% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100%% of any incoming damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire.
witch_doctor_death_ward_Note0: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
item_medallion_of_courage_Description: Active: Valor - If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies.
clinkz_wind_walk_Lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance_Note0: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
tinker_march_of_the_machines_Lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
clinkz_searing_arrows_Description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
chaos_knight_phantasm_Lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
windrunner_powershot_Lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
venomancer_venomous_gale_Lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
gyrocopter_homing_missile_Note2: Maximum damage is reached when the missile is 1500 units away.
alchemist_chemical_rage_Description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
meepo_earthbind_Note0: While preventing units from going invisible, Earthbind won't hit units that are already invisible.
weaver_time_lapse_Note0: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.
furion_sprout_Note0: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
phantom_assassin_blur_Lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn_Lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
night_stalker_darkness_Lore: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.
slardar_amplify_damage_Lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.
life_stealer_open_wounds_Description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
lion_mana_drain_Lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
medusa_split_shot_Description: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.\n\nThe extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.
kunkka_return_Description: Returns the marked hero to the X.
abaddon_death_coil_Description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.
ursa_overpower_Note0: Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.
treant_natures_guise_Lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.
dark_seer_vacuum_Description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
pugna_life_drain_Note0: HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt.
nyx_assassin_impale_Note1: Impale cannot be blocked by Linken's Sphere.
axe_counter_helix_Note0: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate_Note0: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.
slark_pounce_Note3: Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.
mirana_invis_Note1: Spell Immune allies will be affected.
ursa_fury_swipes_Lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
rattletrap_power_cogs_Description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
bane_brain_sap_Lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
shadow_demon_disruption_Lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
brewmaster_primal_split_Note1: The Fire Element has phased movement.
ogre_magi_fireblast_Lore: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.
life_stealer_infest_Note2: Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.
shredder_whirling_death_Description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.
enigma_malefice_Lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field_Note1: Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 100 explosions.
gyrocopter_call_down_Description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for %slow_duration_first% seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for %slow_duration_second% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
furion_teleportation_Description: Teleports to any point on the map.
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss_aghanim_desc: Allows Shuriken Toss to bounce twice on each hero.
venomancer_poison_sting_Note0: Poison Sting damage can be lethal.
elder_titan_earth_splitter_Lore: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.
tidehunter_gush_aghanim_description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.
lone_druid_savage_roar_bear_Description: Spirit Bear roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
witch_doctor_maledict_Lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
oracle_fortunes_end_Description: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, stops movement, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to %max_channel_time_tooltip% seconds. The stop duration is equal to the time spent channeling.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
drow_ranger_trueshot_Description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
silencer_global_silence_Lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest_Note0: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.
warlock_fatal_bonds_Lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
visage_summon_familiars_Note0: Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars.
tinker_march_of_the_machines_Note0: Robots spawn at a rate of 24 per second.
keeper_of_the_light_recall_Note2: You can disable help to prevent Keeper from casting this spell on you.
elder_titan_ancestral_spirit_Lore: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.
shadow_demon_demonic_purge_Lore: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.
phantom_lancer_juxtapose_Description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for %illusion_duration% seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last %illusion_from_illusion_duration% seconds.
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip_Note0: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
life_stealer_rage_Description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip_Descriptio: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced, and take damage if the gripped target is a Stone Remnant.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage_Note2: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Troll Warlord was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
puck_dream_coil_Description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for %dstun_duration% seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
visage_grave_chill_Lore: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
lycan_summon_wolves_Lore: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.
dark_seer_vacuum_Lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
rattletrap_rocket_flare_Description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
invoker_alacrity_Description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> and their damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
rubick_null_field_Description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
warlock_shadow_word_Lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask_Lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
warlock_rain_of_chaos_Description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
elder_titan_echo_stomp_spirit_Lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
weaver_shukuchi_Description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light_Lore: The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.
enchantress_natures_attendants_Note0: Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.
rattletrap_battery_assault_Note1: Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.
tinker_laser_Lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
viper_corrosive_skin_Description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a %max_range_tooltip% radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace_Lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
morphling_morph_agi_Lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast_Note1: Neither the primary or secondary projectiles can be disjointed.
vengefulspirit_command_aura_Description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk_Lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar_Lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
techies_focused_detonate_Description: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.
treant_overgrowth_Lore: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.
oracle_purifying_flames_Lore: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
invoker_exort_Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
storm_spirit_electric_vortex_aghanim_des: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
luna_eclipse_Note1: Beams will stop if Luna is killed.
nevermore_requiem_Note0: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every 2 souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines (23 lines with Scepter).
lone_druid_spirit_bear_return_Descriptio: Immediately teleports the Spirit Bear back to the Lone Druid.  The Spirit Bear cannot teleport if it has taken damage from a player unit in the last 3 seconds.
windrunner_powershot_Description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%%.
pugna_decrepify_Lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
phoenix_icarus_dive_Lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form_Note0: Corrosive Breath poison damage is lethal.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest_Description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap_aghanim_descr: Decreases cooldown, allows swapping of non-hero units and causes Vengeful Spirit to spawn a Vengeance Illusion when she dies. Vengeance illusion lasts until she revives and is able to use all of your abilities (but not items).
razor_plasma_field_Lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.
mirana_leap_Description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
item_medallion_of_courage_Lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.
pudge_meat_hook_Lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
skeleton_king_reincarnation_Note3: Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
tusk_walrus_punch_Lore: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.
bane_fiends_grip_Description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
mirana_arrow_Description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
tusk_frozen_sigil_Note2: Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
huskar_berserkers_blood_Lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
centaur_stampede_Description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
life_stealer_feast_Description: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.
invoker_emp_Description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50%% of the mana drained.
templar_assassin_psi_blades_Note1: Attack effects like Unique Attack Modifiers and Bash will only be applied to the main target.
lycan_shapeshift_Description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal a critical strike doing %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
clinkz_death_pact_Note2: When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.
spectre_dispersion_Note2: Damage is reflected before reductions, and is returned as the same damage type.
weaver_time_lapse_aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.
razor_unstable_current_Note0: Damage activates when the spell cast on Razor.
pudge_dismember_Note1: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.
spirit_breaker_empowering_haste_Descript: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for %duration% seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.
techies_remote_mines_Note0: Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
tusk_walrus_punch_Description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth_Note1: Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.
bloodseeker_bloodrage_Description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.
night_stalker_crippling_fear_Description: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.
leshrac_split_earth_Description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap_Note1: Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
visage_summon_familiars_Description: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
brewmaster_primal_split_aghanim_descript: Earth gains Thunder Clap, Storm gains Drunken Haze and Fire gains Drunken Brawler.
leshrac_lightning_storm_Description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
axe_berserkers_call_Lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
antimage_mana_break_Description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60%% of the mana burned as damage to the target.\n\nMana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
shadow_shaman_voodoo_Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
shredder_timber_chain_Lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
enigma_black_hole_aghanim_description: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.
naga_siren_ensnare_Description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
morphling_morph_str_Note1: Morph can't convert stats from items.
life_stealer_open_wounds_Note0: Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70% / 70% / 60% / 50% / 30% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk_Description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After %delay% second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600%% damage and deals 20%% damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness_Note1: The charge indicator is visible only to allies.
brewmaster_drunken_brawler_Note0: The guaranteed critical attack and guaranteed dodge chance are on separate timers.
gyrocopter_homing_missile_Note1: The crosshair effect is visible to allies only.
invoker_attribute_bonus_Description: Improves all attributes per point spent
rubick_spell_steal_Lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
pudge_rot_Description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
juggernaut_omni_slash_Description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
viper_viper_strike_Description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
wisp_spirits_out_Description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.
alchemist_acid_spray_Lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
invoker_deafening_blast_Description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak_Lore: Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.
batrider_flaming_lasso_Note0: Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap_Description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
luna_lunar_blessing_Lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade_Note1: Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.
life_stealer_consume_Description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.
mirana_invis_Description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
alchemist_unstable_concoction_Note0: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing.
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast_Description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a %split_radius% radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by %movespeed_slow_tooltip%%%.
lion_voodoo_Lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
weaver_the_swarm_Lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
chen_test_of_faith_teleport_Description: Teleports an allied unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.
enigma_black_hole_Lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance_aghanim_desc: Causes Spirit Lance to bounce on nearby enemies.
wisp_relocate_Description: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
dragon_knight_breathe_fire_Lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
meepo_poof_Description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.
omniknight_repel_Lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
invoker_wex_Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
shadow_shaman_shackles_Description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss_Description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a %bounce_aoe% radius of each other.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
magnataur_empower_Description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
slark_dark_pact_Note3: The pulses stop if Slark dies.
earthshaker_enchant_totem_aghanim_descri: Enchant Totem becomes a 900 range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.
mirana_leap_Lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
bane_enfeeble_Description: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.
ursa_enrage_Lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
batrider_flaming_lasso_Description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
invoker_quas_Description: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Each <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instance provides increased health regeneration.\n
elder_titan_ancestral_spirit_Description: Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged.\n\nThe Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.
juggernaut_omni_slash_aghanim_descriptio: Increases number of slashes and decreases cooldown.
skywrath_mage_ancient_seal_Description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb_Lore: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.
weaver_shukuchi_Note0: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage_Descriptio: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and stunning the target. Berserker's Rage also grants additional health, movement speed, armor, and increased attack speed.\n\nWhirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.
omniknight_degen_aura_Description: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
pudge_flesh_heap_Lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
morphling_hybrid_Description: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.
tusk_ice_shards_Lore: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.
treant_living_armor_Lore: The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.
dragon_knight_breathe_fire_Description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger_Descrip: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing %base_damage%+%attack_factor_tooltip%%% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
dazzle_shadow_wave_Lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
lycan_howl_Description: Grants bonus damage and bonus health to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control. Howl has double effect during night.
slardar_amplify_damage_Note0: Gives True Sight and vision of the target.
antimage_mana_void_Lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
lich_chain_frost_Description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to %jumps% times, slowing and damaging each time it hits.  The first target is mini-stunned.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
morphling_morph_agi_Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
life_stealer_infest_Description: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health.  Does not work on enemy heroes.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip_Lore: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.
faceless_void_time_lock_Lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
chaos_knight_reality_rift_Note0: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his phantasms are issued an attack order against the target.
pudge_dismember_Description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.
viper_nethertoxin_Description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20%% of health missing from the target.  Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.
brewmaster_earth_hurl_boulder_Descriptio: Throws a boulder at a unit, doing damage and stunning it.
huskar_burning_spear_Description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.
tidehunter_kraken_shell_Note2: Kraken Shell removes most buffs, even if they are generally not purgable.
furion_wrath_of_nature_Note1: Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
bloodseeker_bloodrage_Note1: Only amplifies for half values when the damage dealer and the receiver are over 2200 range apart.
lina_light_strike_array_Description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
juggernaut_blade_fury_Description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
skeleton_king_reincarnation_Note0: Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
razor_static_link_Note0: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes greater than 800 (1020 with Aether Lens).
skeleton_king_mortal_strike_Lore: One blow to crush a foe.
brewmaster_primal_split_Description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
shredder_chakram_2_Note0: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.
abaddon_frostmourne_Lore: The curse that slows an enemy, speeds an ally.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare_Note1: Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.
chaos_knight_reality_rift_Description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Reduces the target's armor for %armor_duration% seconds.
visage_gravekeepers_cloak_Description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
monkey_king_tree_dance_Note0: Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
nevermore_necromastery_Note0: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
broodmother_spin_web_Note2: If free movement is disabled, you will destroy nearby trees.
invoker_empty2_Description: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
clinkz_death_pact_Description: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.
omniknight_repel_Description: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them Spell Immunity and 100%% resistance to Magic Damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
nevermore_requiem_aghanim_description: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk_Note0: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation.
storm_spirit_overload_Description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
queenofpain_shadow_strike_Note0: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.
naga_siren_mirror_image_Note0: Naga Siren is invulnerable for 0.3 seconds when casting, allowing her to dodge stuns and damage.
special_bonus_unique_warlock_1: Magic Immunity for Chaotic Offering Golems
doom_bringer_devour_Note1: The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit.
skeleton_king_reincarnation_Lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
invoker_invoke_Lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
huskar_berserkers_blood_Note1: Bonuses are provided linearly, no bonus at 100% HP and full bonus at 10% HP.
bloodseeker_blood_bath_Lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
chen_penitence_Description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.
troll_warlord_battle_trance_Lore: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.
tusk_snowball_Note3: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
oracle_purifying_flames_Description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
shadow_shaman_voodoo_Lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
weaver_geminate_attack_Lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
bristleback_quill_spray_Lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
rattletrap_rocket_flare_Lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
nevermore_shadowraze2_Description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.
slark_dark_pact_Note0: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage.
sven_great_cleave_Lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror_Descriptio: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
tusk_launch_snowball_Note2: Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
monkey_king_tree_dance_Note1: Right-click ground to drop from tree.
meepo_earthbind_Lore: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
axe_culling_blade_aghanim_description: Decreases cooldown, increases kill threshold, and increases bonus movement speed duration.
nevermore_necromastery_Description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
nyx_assassin_burrow_Lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
warlock_rain_of_chaos_Note1: This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.
shredder_reactive_armor_Description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.
lycan_feral_impulse_Lore: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.
chen_holy_persuasion_Lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
alchemist_unstable_concoction_throw_Desc: Throw it before it blows up!
shadow_demon_demonic_purge_Note0: Demonic Purge will slow Spell Immune units.
sniper_assassinate_Note2: Interrupts channeling spell, including on Spell Immune units.
dazzle_weave_aghanim_description: Increases radius and armor per second.
jakiro_ice_path_Lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
invoker_cold_snap_Description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.
enigma_midnight_pulse_Lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
warlock_upheaval_Lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
earthshaker_echo_slam_Description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.
alchemist_unstable_concoction_Note2: You can deny yourself with this skill.
phantom_lancer_juxtapose_Note0: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.
medusa_mystic_snake_Description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and steals %snake_mana_steal%%% of the targets' total mana. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.
chaos_knight_reality_rift_Lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura_Note0: Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.
beastmaster_boar_poison_Description: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura_Note1: The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip_Note1: Can pull allied heroes with Scepter.
zuus_static_field_Lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
queenofpain_blink_Lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Note4: The Frostbitten debuff cannot be purged.
