naga_siren_ensnare_Lore: The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.
life_stealer_feast_Lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
lion_mana_drain_Description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
tiny_toss_Lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
nevermore_shadowraze3_Description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist_Lore: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
earthshaker_enchant_totem_Lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
broodmother_spin_web_Note0: Has a fade time of 2 seconds.
windrunner_shackleshot_Description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.
ogre_magi_fireblast_Note1: Mana cost is increased by 20 / 40 / 60 when learning Multi Cast.
nevermore_shadowraze1_Description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike_Note0: Spirit Breaker appears behind the target to deliver the bash.
zuus_static_field_Description: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.
keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak_Note0: If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.
tidehunter_kraken_shell_Lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
viper_poison_attack_Note0: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness_Lore: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.
gyrocopter_flak_cannon_Lore: This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.
monkey_king_jingu_mastery_Note0: Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
techies_remote_mines_Description: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
legion_commander_overwhelming_odds_Descr: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
treant_overgrowth_Note1: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.
slardar_slithereen_crush_Description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
abyssal_underlord_dark_rift_Lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
tusk_frozen_sigil_Note1: The Sigil has unobstructed movement, has a 310 movement speed, requires 3/3/4/4 hero attacks to destroy and 12/12/16/16 creep attacks to destroy, provides 400/400 vision, and gives a 90/100/110/120 gold bounty.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn_Note0: Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
bounty_hunter_jinada_Description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
gyrocopter_homing_missile_Lore: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.
alchemist_chemical_rage_Lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
treant_natures_guise_Note0: Attack out of invisibilty cannot miss.
axe_battle_hunger_Description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
alchemist_chemical_rage_aghanim_descript: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form_Note3: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Dragon Knight was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
lich_frost_armor_Note0: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap_Note1: They have invisibility that fades in over 2 seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.
lycan_summon_wolves_Note0: If wolves are summoned during the duration of Howl, they will receive the buff until the end of its duration.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_Note2: The area of the song follows Naga, so if she moves far enough away from affected units, they will wake up.
pudge_meat_hook_Note3: Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
medusa_split_shot_Lore: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
faceless_void_chronosphere_Note0: Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.
pudge_meat_hook_Description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tusk_snowball_Note4: Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.
brewmaster_storm_wind_walk_Description: Provides temporary invisibility.  Bonus movement speed and attack damage when invisible.
antimage_blink_Note0: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
death_prophet_exorcism_Lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
juggernaut_blade_dance_Description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
disruptor_glimpse_Description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.
monkey_king_wukongs_command_Lore: Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
axe_battle_hunger_Lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
brewmaster_primal_split_Note0: The Earth Element will carry all auras that the Brewmaster has, as well as True Sight.
sniper_headshot_Description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.
batrider_flaming_lasso_Note3: Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace_Note1: Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.
gyrocopter_homing_missile_Note3: The missile will follow and hit invisible units.
nyx_assassin_impale_Description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
invoker_invoke_Note0: The arrangement of instances does not matter.
legion_commander_moment_of_courage_Descr: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
shadow_shaman_ether_shock_Note0: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.
spectre_dispersion_Note0: The reflected damage is not dealt to Spectre.
tiny_grow_Note0: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
techies_stasis_trap_Note2: Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
dark_seer_surge_Lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
winter_wyvern_cold_embrace_Description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
kunkka_ghostship_Description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.\n\nUpgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
pudge_meat_hook_Note0: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
lone_druid_rabid_Lore: Bears are not commonly seen as being agile creatures, but can actually move rather quickly, especially when enraged.
tiny_craggy_exterior_Note0: The damage and stun occur when an attack lands.
rubick_fade_bolt_Description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
batrider_sticky_napalm_Lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
rubick_telekinesis_Note2: The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.
nyx_assassin_impale_Lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
rubick_empty2_Description: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.
death_prophet_carrion_swarm_Description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
brewmaster_primal_split_Note2: When the spell ends, Brewmaster will take the place of an element in this order, assuming they are alive: Earth, Storm, Fire.
bloodseeker_blood_bath_Note0: Total time is a 2.6 second delay plus a 0.4 second cast time.
invoker_invoke_Description: Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use.  Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade_Description: CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a %range% AoE once per second.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
doom_bringer_doom_Lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
shredder_timber_chain_Description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
pudge_rot_Note2: If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
invoker_invoke_aghanim_description: Decreases cooldown and removes mana cost from Invoke. Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.
lion_finger_of_death_aghanim_description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
slark_shadow_dance_Note0: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the passive movement and health regeneration bonuses are lost for 2 seconds.
medusa_stone_gaze_Lore: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.
puck_phase_shift_Note2: Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
beastmaster_inner_beast_Description: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare_Description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over %duration% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lina_fiery_soul_Note0: Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo_Lore: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.
phoenix_sun_ray_Note0: Sun Ray has a width of 130 units, and a length of 1300 units.
winter_wyvern_winters_curse_Note0: If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
lich_chain_frost_Note0: The first target will be immediately interrupted.  This stun goes through spell immunity.
leshrac_diabolic_edict_Lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
tiny_grow_Description: Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
treant_living_armor_Note0: Can be cast through the minimap.
disruptor_static_storm_Lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.
slark_dark_pact_Note1: Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark.
arc_warden_magnetic_field_Lore: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.
faceless_void_time_walk_Lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
nevermore_dark_lord_Note0: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
storm_spirit_static_remnant_Lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant_Lore: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!
tusk_launch_snowball_Description: Launch the snowball toward the target.
beastmaster_wild_axes_Note0: This ability hits Spell Immune units.
nyx_assassin_impale_Note0: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.
skywrath_mage_ancient_seal_Lore: A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.
dark_seer_ion_shell_Note2: If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast_Note0: The primary projectile moves at 500 movespeed, or reaches the target in 1 second, whichever is faster up to 4000 speed.
ursa_enrage_Description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take %damage_reduction%%% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
alchemist_acid_spray_Description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.
abaddon_aphotic_shield_Description: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
monkey_king_mischief_Description: Changes Monkey King's shape to deceive opponents, using the environment nearby as inspiration for the disguise. Taking damage, attacking, or using any item or ability breaks Monkey King's disguise.
rubick_fade_bolt_Lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
magnataur_empower_Note1: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura_Note1: Can be toggled to make heroes only.
sven_warcry_Note0: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.
life_stealer_open_wounds_Note1: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
kunkka_ghostship_Note1: Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
faceless_void_chronosphere_Description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
oracle_false_promise_Description: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
mirana_starfall_Note0: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
dazzle_shallow_grave_Note0: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.
chaos_knight_phantasm_Note0: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.
morphling_morph_agi_Note1: Morph can't convert stats from items.
arc_warden_flux_Lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.
abaddon_death_coil_Lore: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.
brewmaster_thunder_clap_Description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.
spectre_haunt_Description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.\n\nHaunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.
chaos_knight_phantasm_Note1: Chaos Knight is invulnerable for 0.5 seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.
bounty_hunter_track_Note1: Track's effect is only visible to allies.
lone_druid_true_form_druid_Description: Return to Druid form.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
invoker_emp_Note0: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).
enigma_demonic_conversion_Description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
huskar_burning_spear_Lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
tinker_laser_Description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
windrunner_shackleshot_Note0: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
undying_decay_Description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist_Note3: Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot_Descriptio: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
broodmother_spawn_spiderite_Description: Applies debuff on attack. If debuffed unit dies, a spiderite will spawn.
disruptor_kinetic_field_Description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
enigma_midnight_pulse_Description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison_Note0: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.
razor_eye_of_the_storm_aghanim_descripti: Causes faster strikes that can damage structures as well.  When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
drow_ranger_marksmanship_aghanim_descrip: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
undying_flesh_golem_Note1: Dying illusions don't trigger the heal.
chaos_knight_chaos_strike_Description: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage, also causing the critical strike to lifesteal for %lifesteal%%% of the damage .
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace_Lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.
enchantress_impetus_Note1: Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.
earthshaker_enchant_totem_Note0: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
faceless_void_time_walk_Description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last %backtrack_duration% seconds.
enigma_midnight_pulse_Note1: This ability destroys trees in its area.
dark_seer_surge_Note0: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.
invoker_invoke_Note1: Invoke will not cost mana or go on cooldown if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.
jakiro_dual_breath_Note0: Can hit units up to 1000 range away.
item_monkey_king_bar_Description: Passive: Mini-Bash - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.\nPassive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
medusa_mana_shield_Lore: While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.
chen_test_of_faith_Description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
pugna_life_drain_Lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
furion_teleportation_Note1: Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.
chen_holy_persuasion_Note2: The health of creeps that are currently persuaded will not be increased further if more levels are added to the skill.
drow_ranger_trueshot_Lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.
winter_wyvern_winters_curse_Note1: Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.
clinkz_searing_arrows_Note1: The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.
leshrac_pulse_nova_Description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
mirana_starfall_Lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
pugna_life_drain_Description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
antimage_mana_break_Note1: You can lifeleech the damage dealt by this skill with a Lifesteal aura.
zuus_lightning_bolt_Description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in %spread_aoe% range.
undying_flesh_golem_Note2: Plague Aura goes through spell immunity.
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment_N: Imprisoned units are hidden and invulnerable.
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge_Description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost upon reaching the target. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
templar_assassin_refraction_Note1: Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.
visage_grave_chill_Description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.
nevermore_requiem_Note1: The movement and attack damage reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.
razor_eye_of_the_storm_Note0: Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
alchemist_unstable_concoction_Note1: A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. This timer is visible to enemies.
furion_wrath_of_nature_Note0: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
brewmaster_drunken_haze_Lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!
phoenix_supernova_Lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura_Lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
juggernaut_healing_ward_Description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %healing_ward_duration_tooltip% seconds.
arc_warden_tempest_double_Lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
luna_lunar_blessing_Description: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.
earthshaker_fissure_Note1: Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
queenofpain_shadow_strike_Note1: Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.
vengefulspirit_magic_missile_Description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
visage_gravekeepers_cloak_Lore: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice_Lore: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.
doom_bringer_empty2_Description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
lone_druid_true_form_druid_aghanim_descr: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
dark_troll_warlord_raise_dead_Descriptio: The Dark Troll Summoner stirs the ground underfoot, raising the remains of trolls long dead, bringing to life two skeleton Warriors who will fight at his side.
huskar_inner_vitality_Description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.
bloodseeker_thirst_Lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
chen_holy_persuasion_Note0: You may only cast this ability on Ancient Creeps with Aghanim's Scepter.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn_Description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of %percent_damage%%% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her %night_vision_bonus% additional vision range at night while soaring.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
puck_illusory_orb_Note1: Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura_Note0: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses.
enchantress_enchant_Description: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.
enigma_malefice_Description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.
templar_assassin_refraction_Note0: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).
puck_illusory_orb_Lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
sniper_shrapnel_Lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
broodmother_insatiable_hunger_Descriptio: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
zuus_lightning_bolt_Lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
furion_wrath_of_nature_aghanim_descripti: Increases damage. If a unit is killed by Wrath of Nature, or within 4 seconds thereafter, a Nature's Call treant will spawn. These treants' health and damage are based on the current level of Nature's Call. If a hero is killed, a Greater Treant will be created, which has 3 times as much health and damage.
antimage_mana_void_Description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
huskar_berserkers_blood_Note0: Maximum bonus is achieved when Huskar has strictly less than 10% of his maximum HP.
centaur_return_Description: Centaur applies an aura to nearby allied units. Causes allies to counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.
slardar_bash_Note1: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
wisp_relocate_Note2: If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.
luna_eclipse_Description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
luna_eclipse_Note4: There is a .6 seconds gap between beams, .3 seconds with scepter.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe_Lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night_Lore: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica_Note1: Creates a wall 1000 units long, perpendicular to the line between Dark Seer and the target point.
slark_pounce_Description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
dazzle_shadow_wave_Note1: If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they will take multiple instances of damage.
warlock_rain_of_chaos_aghanim_descriptio: Calls 2 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.
bloodseeker_bloodrage_Lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
lycan_summon_wolves_critical_strike_Desc: Gives %maim_chance%%% to cripple the target, causing %maim_damage% damage per second and lose %maim_attack_speed% Attack Speed for %maim_duration% seconds.
necrolyte_sadist_Lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.
life_stealer_assimilate_Lore: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?
phoenix_fire_spirits_Lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
jakiro_dual_breath_Note1: Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.
undying_soul_rip_Lore: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.
abyssal_underlord_firestorm_Description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
legion_commander_duel_Description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
elder_titan_natural_order_spirit_Note0: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
techies_land_mines_Note2: Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.
nyx_assassin_vendetta_Note1: If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.
zuus_thundergods_wrath_aghanim_descripti: Grants a new ability, creating a cloud that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
doom_bringer_empty1_Description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
weaver_geminate_attack_Note0: The second attack leaves Weaver 0.25 seconds after the first, and has no range limit.
pugna_life_drain_aghanim_description: Increases drain per second and removes cooldown.
juggernaut_blade_fury_Note1: You can use items during Blade Fury.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace_Description: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.\n\nWhile Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge_Lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
luna_eclipse_Note0: Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.
abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice_Descript: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be rooted for %ensnare_duration% seconds. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected every %pit_interval% seconds.
antimage_spell_shield_Description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
witch_doctor_death_ward_Note1: The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
oracle_purifying_flames_Note0: The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.
slark_essence_shift_Description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura_Lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
treant_leech_seed_Description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 6 times.
monkey_king_boundless_strike_Lore: The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
meepo_poof_Lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_demolish_Descript: Increases the power of the Spirit Bear, causing it to deal more damage to buildings and have additional spell resistance.
ogre_magi_ignite_Note1: Multicast makes this spell have 150 additional cast range for every Multicast level.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_Note0: Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.
spectre_dispersion_Lore: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
rattletrap_power_cogs_Lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
lone_druid_savage_roar_Note1: Cooldown is shared with Spirit Bear.
slardar_bash_Lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
jakiro_macropyre_Note0: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.
warlock_rain_of_chaos_Lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt_Description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
visage_gravekeepers_cloak_Note0: Each time Visage receives damage greater than 50 that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.
obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura_Lore: The crystals of the Outworld produce arcane power, and the Harbinger channels it into the world of mortals.
arc_warden_tempest_double_Description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has seperate item and ability cooldowns.
venomancer_poison_nova_Description: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tusk_launch_snowball_Note1: The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.
medusa_mana_shield_Description: Creates a shield that absorbs %absorption_tooltip%%% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.
visage_grave_chill_Note0: The two buffs can be removed separately by purge.
clinkz_searing_arrows_Note0: Searing Arrows deal damage to structures.
life_stealer_open_wounds_Lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
tusk_snowball_Note1: The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.
spectre_reality_Lore: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.
lycan_summon_wolves_Note2: Using this spell will replace currently active Spirit Wolves.
tiny_avalanche_Note0: Deals damage over a 1 second duration.
invoker_quas_Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
troll_warlord_whirling_axes_melee_Descri: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
clinkz_searing_arrows_Lore: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
rattletrap_battery_assault_Lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
bounty_hunter_jinada_Lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
treant_overgrowth_aghanim_description: When Overgrowth is cast, it is also cast around Eye of the Forest to deal 175 damage per second.
tidehunter_ravage_Lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward_Descript: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. It takes two hits to destroy a single Ward.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura_Description: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap_Lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
storm_spirit_static_remnant_Note2: The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.
medusa_split_shot_Note1: If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.
abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura_Lore: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.
abyssal_underlord_dark_rift_Description: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's position.  After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location.  Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast.  If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.
centaur_double_edge_Lore: In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.
pugna_nether_ward_Description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.
abaddon_aphotic_shield_Lore: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.
chaos_knight_phantasm_aghanim_descriptio: Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds and allows Phantoms to be cast on an allied hero. 1200 Cast Range
juggernaut_healing_ward_Note0: The healing ward can be controlled.
windrunner_windrun_Note0: The slow will affect enemies with spell immunity.
zuus_static_field_Note1: Using items doesn't trigger Static Field.
invoker_ice_wall_Note0: The slow will still affect Spell Immune enemies if their spell immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance_Description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
leshrac_pulse_nova_Lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.
treant_overgrowth_Note0: Works on Spell Immune units, but if units gain spell immunity after the effect starts, they'll break free.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar_Descri: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_aghanim_descripti: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
visage_soul_assumption_Note0: Charges are only gained for damage greater than 2 and less than 3000 that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.
riki_smoke_screen_Lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
centaur_return_Note0: Return triggers when the attack hits.
undying_tombstone_Note0: Tombstone is Spell Immune, but can be healed by Soul Rip.
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom_Lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
wisp_spirits_Lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.
oracle_purifying_flames_aghanim_descript: Reduces cooldown and improves cast point.
vengefulspirit_command_aura_Lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
undying_decay_Note1: The strength steal takes effect before the damage is dealt.
juggernaut_omni_slash_Lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
techies_suicide_Note1: Techies still earn experience for suicide kills made with this ability.
dazzle_shadow_wave_Description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
beastmaster_hawk_invisibility_Descriptio: If motionless for some time, the hawk becomes invisible.
night_stalker_crippling_fear_Lore: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_Lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
brewmaster_drunken_brawler_Description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
bane_nightmare_Note1: Any source of damage except Nightmare will awaken the unit, but only physical attacks cause the Nightmare to be transferred.
slardar_bash_Note0: Stun works on Spell Immune units.
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse_Descri: Unleashes a psychic blast that removes %mana_drain%%% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's Intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
undying_flesh_golem_Lore: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.
elder_titan_earth_splitter_Description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
life_stealer_infest_Note1: Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.
leshrac_split_earth_Lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
bloodseeker_rupture_Lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.
pugna_decrepify_Description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
tiny_grow_Note1: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
terrorblade_metamorphosis_Note0: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Terrorblade was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
windrunner_focusfire_Note0: Can target buildings and Spell Immune units.
bloodseeker_rupture_Description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
death_prophet_silence_Description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
broodmother_incapacitating_bite_Descript: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt_Note0: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_Note1: You can't resummon the bear if it has taken damage in the past 3 seconds.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina: Allows Illuminate to heal allies for 100%% of its damage values during daytime.
ember_spirit_fire_remnant_Lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
lina_fiery_soul_Description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts %fiery_soul_stack_duration% seconds.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap_Note2: Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.
ancient_apparition_cold_feet_Lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
broodmother_insatiable_hunger_Note0: Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.
broodmother_incapacitating_bite_Note0: The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.
skeleton_king_mortal_strike_Description: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.
shadow_demon_disruption_Description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
troll_warlord_fervor_Lore: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.
elder_titan_return_spirit_Description: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.
morphling_morph_str_Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
tiny_avalanche_Description: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.
ember_spirit_searing_chains_Description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe_Note1: The stun goes through spell immunity, but not the damage.
windrunner_windrun_Description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
wisp_empty2_Description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder_Description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a %delay%s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and enemies hit by the boulder will have their movement speed slowed.
weaver_time_lapse_Lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
tiny_toss_Note0: If a unit is hit by Avalanche then Tossed, it can be hit a second time by Avalanche if it lands in the area of effect before Avalanche ends.
lich_frost_nova_Description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
ogre_magi_ignite_Note0: Multicast makes this spell have an area of effect (150/300/450 based on Multicast level).
weaver_the_swarm_Note1: Beetles are Spell Immune, but can be killed in 4 attacks from a hero, or 8 from other units.
rubick_empty1_Description: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.
doom_bringer_infernal_blade_Description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for %ministun_duration% seconds and applies a %burn_duration% second burn that deals %burn_damage% + %burn_damage_pct%%% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
tinker_rearm_Lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
life_stealer_rage_Lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare_aghanim_descr: Anytime Skywrath Mage casts an ability, a different random nearby target will be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.
puck_dream_coil_aghanim_description: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.
wisp_empty1_Description: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.
slark_pounce_Note1: Spell Immune units cannot be leashed.
dragon_knight_dragon_tail_Lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
storm_spirit_static_remnant_Description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
dazzle_weave_Note0: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.
spectre_spectral_dagger_Lore: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
huskar_inner_vitality_Note1: Can be cast on Spell Immune units.
silencer_global_silence_aghanim_descript: Applies the current level of Arcane Curse to all enemy Heroes.
tinker_laser_aghanim_description: Causes Laser to refract between all visible enemy units within range.
dazzle_poison_touch_Note0: The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
bloodseeker_bloodrage_Note0: Bloodrage can be cast on enemy and allied units, as well as Bloodseeker himself.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica_Lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
enchantress_impetus_Description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lycan_shapeshift_Note1: Lycan has a smaller collision size in this state.
naga_siren_rip_tide_Note0: Naga's illusions will also cast Rip Tide, but enemies in multiple areas of effect will only be hit once.
naga_siren_mirror_image_Description: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
naga_siren_rip_tide_Lore: A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.
morphling_morph_replicate_Description: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.
nevermore_dark_lord_Lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
slark_dark_pact_Lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
tidehunter_ravage_Note1: Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of 775.
tiny_craggy_exterior_Description: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers. Melee enemies that attack Tiny have a chance of being stunned.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk_Note2: Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration_Descript: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.
puck_phase_shift_Lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
techies_land_mines_Note1: Proximity Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
jakiro_dual_breath_Description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
spectre_desolate_Note0: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack.
shredder_chakram_2_Description: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5%% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
dazzle_shallow_grave_Description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.
techies_land_mines_Note4: Mines will not be triggered by some flying units.
medusa_split_shot_Note0: Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target.
windrunner_focusfire_Lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
silencer_curse_of_the_silent_Note0: If an enemy hero affected by Arcane Curse is silenced, Arcane Curse will pause damage, slow and duration.
queenofpain_shadow_strike_Description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
sniper_take_aim_Description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.
silencer_curse_of_the_silent_Description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.
luna_eclipse_aghanim_description: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.
batrider_flaming_lasso_Note1: If Batrider moves more than 400 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks.
magnataur_empower_Note0: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes.
gyrocopter_call_down_Note0: The visual indicator is visible to allies only.
centaur_stampede_aghanim_description: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs.
omniknight_guardian_angel_aghanim_descri: Increases duration, radius becomes global and affects buildings.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare_Lore: Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.
brewmaster_primal_split_Lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.
jakiro_macropyre_Lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
disruptor_glimpse_Note0: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.
pugna_nether_ward_Note2: Nether Ward has 4 HP. Heroes attack it for 1 damage, while illusions and non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
meepo_divided_we_stand_Description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
weaver_the_swarm_Description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
ursa_fury_swipes_Description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
treant_leech_seed_Lore: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.
lone_druid_rabid_Description: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist_Description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
mirana_invis_Note0: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
earth_spirit_boulder_smash_Note0: Stun is only applied if the initial target is a Stone Remnant.
skeleton_king_reincarnation_Note1: If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
medusa_stone_gaze_Note1: Regardless of when a unit receives the Stone Gaze buff while the ability is active on Medusa, it will still receive the full debuff duration.
puck_waning_rift_Description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Note1: Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter.
invoker_forge_spirit_Note0: Casting this abiliy will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison_release_Descr: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.
leshrac_diabolic_edict_Note0: Damage is not reduced by damage block.
kunkka_torrent_Note1: Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.
juggernaut_blade_fury_Lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
weaver_the_swarm_Note0: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires.
ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant_Descr: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
monkey_king_jingu_mastery_Description: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura_Note0: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
faceless_void_time_lock_Note1: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
lion_impale_Lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
slark_shadow_dance_Lore: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_Lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
venomancer_plague_ward_Description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50%% of the full damage.
faceless_void_time_walk_Note0: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
oracle_false_promise_Note0: Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
ogre_magi_fireblast_Note0: When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a 0.3 seconds interval.
wisp_overcharge_Note0: Io's tethered unit will also benefit from the attack speed and reduction, but only Io pays the drain in HP and mana.
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage_Note0: Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.
huskar_burning_spear_Note1: Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.
slardar_bash_Description: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.
necrolyte_sadist_Description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
furion_teleportation_Note2: When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.
disruptor_static_storm_Description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
antimage_spell_shield_Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
omniknight_guardian_angel_Lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
shadow_shaman_ether_shock_Lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
crystal_maiden_frostbite_Description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing %damage_per_second_tooltip% damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
death_prophet_spirit_siphon_Description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining %damage% + %damage_pct%%% Max HP per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed by %movement_slow%%%.
arc_warden_spark_wraith_Description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment_L: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
visage_grave_chill_Note1: The speed gained is independent of the speed lost on the target.
pugna_nether_ward_Note0: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect.
elder_titan_natural_order_spirit_Descrip: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
warlock_rain_of_chaos_Note0: Spell Immune units will be stunned.
enchantress_untouchable_Description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade_Lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
visage_soul_assumption_Description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than %damage_limit% damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
queenofpain_shadow_strike_Lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
oracle_fates_edict_Lore: An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...
templar_assassin_meld_Note0: Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position.
templar_assassin_psi_blades_Description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.
omniknight_purification_Lore: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.
earthshaker_enchant_totem_Note1: Self-cast with Scepter will make it behave in the non-Scepter form, without jumping.
venomancer_venomous_gale_Description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn_Note1: This ability does not affect Roshan.
faceless_void_time_lock_Description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
mirana_arrow_Note0: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
chen_holy_persuasion_Description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Chen to persuade Ancient Creeps. The number of Ancient Creeps that can be persuaded is based on the level of Hand of God.
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare_Note0: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
warlock_upheaval_Description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
treant_living_armor_Description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.
enchantress_untouchable_Lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
brewmaster_thunder_clap_Lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.
morphling_waveform_Lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
enigma_demonic_conversion_Lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
riki_smoke_screen_Description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.
bane_nightmare_Lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
dark_seer_ion_shell_Note1: Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.
viper_viper_strike_Note0: Slow works on spell immune units.
rubick_telekinesis_Lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
kunkka_tidebringer_Lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
invoker_chaos_meteor_Description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, and rolling further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_aghanim_: Permanent Spirit Form. During daytime, grants unobstructed vision, and allows Illuminate to heal allies for the same amount as its damage values.
ogre_magi_bloodlust_Description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.
bane_nightmare_Note2: In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
pugna_nether_blast_Lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
dark_seer_ion_shell_Note0: Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals.
ogre_magi_ignite_Note2: Multicast makes this spell have a chance to cast multiple times at random enemy units with 1400 area of effect.
pudge_dismember_Note0: Dismember will disable Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
lina_light_strike_array_Lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
treant_overgrowth_Description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
techies_minefield_sign_Description: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts %lifetime% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
furion_force_of_nature_Note0: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.
keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak_Descriptio: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
rattletrap_hookshot_Description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
batrider_flaming_lasso_aghanim_descripti: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 400 range. The secondary target is tethered to the first. Also causes Flaming Lasso to deal 100 damage per second.
keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic_Lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison_Description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
bristleback_bristleback_Note1: Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.
doom_bringer_devour_Description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.
axe_battle_hunger_Note1: Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.
ursa_earthshock_Description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
sven_great_cleave_Description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
invoker_chaos_meteor_Note0: Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every 0.5 seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over 3 seconds.
kunkka_tidebringer_Note0: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
skeleton_king_reincarnation_Description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a %slow_radius% radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
spectre_reality_Description: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.
undying_flesh_golem_Description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within %radius% range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.
dazzle_weave_Lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
lina_laguna_blade_Description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
huskar_life_break_Description: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
arc_warden_spark_wraith_Lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
tiny_toss_Note1: You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
enigma_black_hole_Description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
ursa_overpower_Lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
vengefulspirit_magic_missile_Lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
furion_sprout_Note1: Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate_Lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
templar_assassin_psi_blades_Lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
clinkz_wind_walk_Description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.
oracle_fates_edict_Description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them %magic_damage_resistance_pct_tooltip%%% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.
terrorblade_reflection_Description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.
leshrac_split_earth_Note0: Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom_Description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot_Description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse_aghani: Sanity's Eclipse will also cast the current level of Astral Imprisonment on affected enemy heroes.
ancient_apparition_ice_vortex_Descriptio: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 16 seconds.
antimage_spell_shield_Lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light_Note0: Causes knockback of 250 range over 0.4 seconds, centered on the middle of the target area. Upon landing, units will destroy trees in a 150 radius.
magnataur_skewer_Description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain_Description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
earth_spirit_boulder_smash_Note1: Boulder Smash's cooldown is not reset if it fails to knock back a unit or Remnant.
lone_druid_true_form_Note1: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Lone Druid was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
magnataur_skewer_Lore: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.
magnataur_empower_aghanim_description: Changes Empower to be an allied hero aura. Affects ranged heroes for half values and causes them to splash around the target. Can still be cast on units, but doesn't stack.
ogre_magi_frost_armor_Description: The Ogre Frostmage summons an invisible layer of icy air that surrounds the target friendly unit, increasing its armor and temporarily slowing any melee enemies that dare attack it.
venomancer_plague_ward_Lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura_Lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
tinker_march_of_the_machines_Description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
faceless_void_time_lock_Note0: Stun works on Spell Immune units.
tidehunter_kraken_shell_Note1: The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for 6 seconds.
morphling_morph_str_Note0: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced.
disruptor_thunder_strike_Description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.  Provides vision of its target.
bristleback_quill_spray_Description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
omniknight_guardian_angel_Description: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter
lich_chain_frost_Note2: Chain Frost has a movement speed of 850.
lion_finger_of_death_Lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
tinker_heat_seeking_missile_Description: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
night_stalker_void_Description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.
silencer_global_silence_Note0: This skill works on invisible and Spell Immune units, but gaining spell immunity will remove its effect.
lina_laguna_blade_Note0: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
warlock_golem_permanent_immolation_Descr: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, with damage per second.
shadow_demon_demonic_purge_aghanim_descr: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 40 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.
visage_summon_familiars_Note1: Each Familiar starts with 7 damage charges.
leshrac_diabolic_edict_Note2: Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.
kunkka_ghostship_Note2: The boat has a movement speed of 650.
jakiro_liquid_fire_Lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
earthshaker_aftershock_Lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
lina_light_strike_array_Note0: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness_Note0: Spirit Breaker passes through trees, cliffs, and units.
zuus_cloud_Note0: Grants 100 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
night_stalker_void_Lore: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.
invoker_forge_spirit_Description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage, mana, and armor are based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.
broodmother_spin_web_Description: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every %dcharge_restore_time% seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for %damage_time% seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
visage_summon_familiars_Lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
terrorblade_sunder_Lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
earth_spirit_petrify_Lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
axe_culling_blade_Description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise.
