When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
doom_bringer_devour_Note2: Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units.
disruptor_kinetic_field_Lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.
morphling_morph_agi_Note0: Morph can be activated or deactivated while Morphling is disabled, but not while silenced.
night_stalker_darkness_Description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to %fixed_vision%. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.
lich_chain_frost_Lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror_Lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance_Lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist_Note2: Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.
broodmother_spin_web_Lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
bane_brain_sap_Description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
razor_eye_of_the_storm_Description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate_Descripti: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
morphling_replicate_Lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
dazzle_weave_Description: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
queenofpain_sonic_wave_Lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
zuus_arc_lightning_Lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
zuus_thundergods_wrath_Description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
slark_pounce_Lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
lich_dark_ritual_Description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.
spectre_haunt_Lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
dragon_knight_dragon_tail_Description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
centaur_double_edge_Note0: Double Edge deals magic type damage to both the targets and himself.
weaver_shukuchi_Lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
luna_moon_glaive_Lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
earthshaker_echo_slam_Note1: Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.
rubick_null_field_Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
leshrac_diabolic_edict_Description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals %tower_bonus%%% more damage to towers.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn_aghanim_descri: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining 40 mana per second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target.
sven_great_cleave_Note1: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
huskar_berserkers_blood_Description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.
phoenix_launch_fire_spirit_Description: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced. Reveals the area it strikes for 1 second.
elder_titan_echo_stomp_Description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.
sniper_assassinate_Lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge_Note0: If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
sniper_headshot_Lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
lycan_shapeshift_Lore: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger_Lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
lion_voodoo_Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
shredder_whirling_death_Lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
pudge_flesh_heap_Description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss_Lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
magnataur_shockwave_Description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.
shredder_chakram_Note0: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.
legion_commander_press_the_attack_Descri: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
bloodseeker_thirst_Description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below %min_bonus_pct%%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below %invis_threshold_pct%%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.
elder_titan_natural_order_Note0: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
wisp_relocate_Note1: If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled.
earthshaker_fissure_Note0: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
elder_titan_echo_stomp_Lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
slardar_sprint_Lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
antimage_mana_break_Note0: Mana Burn is blocked by spell immunity.
life_stealer_assimilate_eject_Descriptio: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.
templar_assassin_self_trap_Description: Springs the trap, slowing nearby enemies.
viper_corrosive_skin_Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic damage resistance sources.
spectre_desolate_Lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
viper_poison_attack_Description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.
undying_tombstone_Note1: Zombies and Tombstone are Spell Immune.
arc_warden_flux_Description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.
puck_waning_rift_Lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
enchantress_impetus_aghanim_description: Increases attack range, and cast range of Impetus.
night_stalker_darkness_aghanim_descripti: Grants unobstructed vision in the night. The improved vision does not depend on using Darkness.
tidehunter_gush_Lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
slardar_sprint_Note0: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.
morphling_replicate_Note0: You can't target yourself with Replicate.
lina_laguna_blade_Lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
abaddon_borrowed_time_Note0: Borrowed Time can be activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.
juggernaut_healing_ward_Lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
beastmaster_wild_axes_Description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.
lion_finger_of_death_Note0: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
rattletrap_hookshot_Note0: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.
pudge_flesh_heap_Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
earthshaker_fissure_Description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field_aghanim_de: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 2.5 seconds.
chen_penitence_Lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist_Note0: Targets are determined when the spell is cast.
oracle_fortunes_end_Lore: The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.
sven_gods_strength_Description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
batrider_firefly_Note0: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain.
lina_laguna_blade_aghanim_description: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.
antimage_mana_void_Note1: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
treant_natures_guise_Note1: Nature's Guise checks in 0.75 second intervals for nearby trees, removing invisibility if none are found.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask_Note0: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.
ember_spirit_flame_guard_Lore: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
lich_frost_armor_Lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
slark_shadow_dance_aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown and causes Shadow Dance active to be an area of effect ability, hiding nearby allied heroes underneath it.
zuus_static_field_Note2: Does not require unit visibility to take effect.
slark_dark_pact_Description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50%% of the damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lycan_shapeshift_Note0: Hex doesn't remove Lycan's movement speed.
life_stealer_feast_Note3: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness_Note2: Spirit Breaker gains shared vision of the target.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration_Lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
kunkka_ghostship_Note0: Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
lone_druid_true_form_Description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
invoker_ice_wall_Description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and deals damage each second based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
windrunner_focusfire_Description: Windranger channels the wind to gain %bonus_attack_speed% additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.  Lasts %focusfire_duration_tooltip% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward_aghanim_: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.
lone_druid_savage_roar_bear_Note1: Cooldown is shared with Lone Druid.
earthshaker_echo_slam_Lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt_Lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
enchantress_impetus_Note0: The damage is capped at 1750 distance.
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo_Descriptio: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
sniper_assassinate_Note0: Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.
pudge_dismember_Lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
techies_land_mines_Note0: Cannot be placed within active AoE of another Proximity Mine.
rubick_spell_steal_aghanim_description: Decreases cooldown, increases cast range and upgrades the spell to the Scepter level.
weaver_the_swarm_Note2: Beetles provide 321/321 sight, but will drop off their target if it becomes invisible.
troll_warlord_fervor_Description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
elder_titan_earth_splitter_aghanim_descr: Increases slow duration, and units pulled in by Earth Splitter are also disarmed.
warlock_fatal_bonds_Description: Binds several enemy units together, causing %damage_share_percentage%%% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
windrunner_powershot_Note0: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form_Note1: Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% damage in a 150/225/300 radius. Splash damage does not affect buildings.
legion_commander_duel_Note0: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
shadow_shaman_shackles_Lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
juggernaut_blade_dance_Lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
tusk_ice_shards_Description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for %shard_duration% seconds.
phoenix_supernova_aghanim_description: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together. Does not refresh ultimate abilities.
nevermore_dark_lord_Description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
tidehunter_anchor_smash_Note0: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt_Note0: The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.
viper_poison_attack_Lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
huskar_burning_spear_Note0: Burning Spears stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap.
doom_bringer_devour_Note0: Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.
invoker_sun_strike_Description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
viper_corrosive_skin_Lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
windrunner_windrun_Note1: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike_Lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.
sven_storm_bolt_Lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
riki_blink_strike_Note1: Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk_Description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings_Note1: Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.
tinker_rearm_Description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
juggernaut_blade_fury_Note2: Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
centaur_hoof_stomp_Lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
shadow_demon_soul_catcher_Lore: Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.
shredder_chakram_2_Lore: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!
earth_spirit_stone_caller_Description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time.
weaver_time_lapse_Description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
terrorblade_metamorphosis_Lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt_Description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
nevermore_requiem_Lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
clinkz_death_pact_Lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
morphling_waveform_Description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
zuus_thundergods_wrath_Lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
invoker_tornado_Note0: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.
lina_dragon_slave_Lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
dark_seer_surge_Description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.
nyx_assassin_unburrow_Lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
sven_gods_strength_Lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
tiny_toss_Description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20%% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.
antimage_mana_void_Note0: The stun passes through spell immunity.
monkey_king_primal_spring_Description: Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.
item_ogre_axe_Lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.
death_prophet_silence_Lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field_Lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
rubick_telekinesis_Description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
zuus_cloud_Description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
earthshaker_fissure_Lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
tusk_walrus_kick_Description: Kicks the target unit back, damaging them and slowing their movement speed.
rubick_telekinesis_Note0: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction.
abaddon_borrowed_time_Lore: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.
enchantress_natures_attendants_Note1: Can heal units with spell immunity.
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment_D: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals %damage% damage to enemies in a %radius% radius around the target.
phoenix_sun_ray_Lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
pudge_meat_hook_Note2: Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch_Descri: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.
earth_spirit_boulder_smash_Description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also stunned. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade_Note0: Attacks once when casted and once per second after that.
spirit_breaker_greater_bash_Lore: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.
centaur_khan_endurance_aura_Description: The fearsome Hellbear Smasher attacks more quickly and bullies nearby allies into following suit.
clinkz_strafe_Lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.
batrider_flaming_lasso_Lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
ursa_overpower_Description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
shadow_shaman_ether_shock_Description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
bane_nightmare_Note0: Nightmare deals damage to allies and himself, so it can be used to deny heroes or himself.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica_aghanim_descri: Increases the damage dealt by illusions.
leshrac_diabolic_edict_Note1: The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.
drow_ranger_frost_arrows_Note0: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.
wisp_tether_Description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
treant_natures_guise_Description: Turns you invis when you are within %radius% radius of a tree for %fade_time% seconds. Increasing movement speed by %bonus_move_speed% while invisible, and causes a %bash_duration% seconds bash when attacking out of invisibility.
storm_spirit_electric_vortex_Lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
clinkz_strafe_Description: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field_Descriptio: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
puck_illusory_orb_Description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
puck_dream_coil_Lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
meepo_geostrike_Description: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.
undying_flesh_golem_Note0: Undying is healed when affected units die in range, regardless of who killed it.
riki_permanent_invisibility_Description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
nyx_assassin_mana_burn_Description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
antimage_spell_shield_aghanim_descriptio: Causes Spell Shield to passively block and reflect a targeted spell once every 12 seconds.
warlock_golem_flaming_fists_Description: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.
undying_decay_Note0: The strength stolen stacks, but can't cause a hero to have strength below 1.
dark_seer_ion_shell_Lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
elder_titan_natural_order_Lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
tidehunter_anchor_smash_Lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
alchemist_unstable_concoction_Descriptio: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
riki_permanent_invisibility_Note1: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
wisp_spirits_Description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
ogre_magi_multicast_Lore: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.
spirit_breaker_greater_bash_Note0: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
ember_spirit_searing_chains_Note1: Does not affect Spell Immune or invisible units.
death_prophet_carrion_swarm_Lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
zuus_lightning_bolt_Note0: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch_Note1: Only works against heroes and creeps.
ancient_apparition_ice_vortex_Lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
keeper_of_the_light_recall_Note3: Can be cast through the minimap, choosing the nearest friendly hero.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth_Description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot_Note1: Damages creeps around the impact area.
spectre_haunt_Note0: Haunt illusions are uncontrollable and move at 400 base movement speed.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap_Descriptio: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30%% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5%% every second, up to 50%%.
venomancer_venomous_gale_Note2: Slow starts at 50%, and decreases as time passes.
chen_holy_persuasion_Note1: When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.
shredder_chakram_Description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5%% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
beastmaster_primal_roar_Lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
witch_doctor_maledict_Description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast_Lore: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.
wisp_tether_Note0: If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300).
queenofpain_scream_of_pain_Lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
riki_blink_strike_Description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
riki_permanent_invisibility_Note0: Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_Description: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.
rubick_telekinesis_land_Description: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.
tiny_toss_Note2: Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.
drow_ranger_marksmanship_Description: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
terrorblade_conjure_image_Description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
slark_dark_pact_Note2: You can't kill yourself with this skill.
disruptor_kinetic_field_Note0: Spell Immune units can travel through the field.
mirana_arrow_Lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
tinker_rearm_Note0: Rearm works on all items except Black King Bar, Arcane Boots, Helm of the Dominator, Hand of Midas, Refresher Orb, Linken's Sphere, Pipe of Insight, and Necronomicon.
techies_stasis_trap_Note0: Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.
gyrocopter_flak_cannon_Note0: Attack range for the primary attack is unchanged.
storm_spirit_ball_lightning_Description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base%+%ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base%+%ball_lightning_travel_cost_percent%%% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
phantom_lancer_juxtapose_Lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
dark_seer_wall_of_replica_Description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask_Description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
juggernaut_omni_slash_Note0: You can use items during Omnislash.
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk_Note0: This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispell debuffs.
meepo_earthbind_Description: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility and blink.
luna_eclipse_Lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
sven_gods_strength_Note0: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
earth_spirit_magnetize_Description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by silence or slows as a result of Geomagnetic Grip or Rolling Boulder, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
kunkka_torrent_Lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
alchemist_unstable_concoction_Lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
dark_seer_vacuum_Note1: Pulls units over 0.5 seconds before dealing damage.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest_Note1: If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip_aghanim_de: Allows Geomagnetic Grip to pull allied heroes.
ember_spirit_flame_guard_Note0: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.
puck_phase_shift_Note1: Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form_Note2: Frost Breath stacks with Unique Attack Modifiers.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest_Lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder_Note0: Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.
bounty_hunter_track_Lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
pugna_decrepify_Note0: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.
nyx_assassin_vendetta_Lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
invoker_ghost_walk_Description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap_Note2: Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.
juggernaut_omni_slash_Note2: Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds.
meepo_poof_Note0: Can be cast through the minimap.
legion_commander_moment_of_courage_Lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.
magnataur_shockwave_Lore: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder_Note1: The boulder has a radius of 150.
beastmaster_primal_roar_Description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
monkey_king_wukongs_command_Description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King and all his soldiers receive bonus damage for the spell's duration.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
windrunner_shackleshot_Note1: Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most 525/500 behind it.
shredder_reactive_armor_Lore: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.
doom_bringer_doom_Note0: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
phoenix_icarus_dive_Note0: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.
invoker_tornado_Description: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
skywrath_mage_ancient_seal_Note0: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.
chen_test_of_faith_Lore: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
templar_assassin_refraction_Description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged_Lore: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
gyrocopter_call_down_aghanim_description: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units within a 600 radius every 1.1 seconds.
naga_siren_rip_tide_Description: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.
huskar_inner_vitality_Note0: The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly.
ogre_magi_bloodlust_Lore: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'
disruptor_glimpse_Lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.
luna_lucent_beam_Lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
monkey_king_tree_dance_Lore: Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Note3: The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain.
oracle_false_promise_Note1: The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.
visage_summon_familiars_stone_form_Descr: After a short delay, the Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After %dstone_duration% seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings_Descriptio: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot_Note0: Does not work when no heroes are in range or heroes are in fog.
tidehunter_kraken_shell_Description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
silencer_last_word_Lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
magnataur_empower_Lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
wisp_tether_break_Description: Break the link to the tethered unit.
life_stealer_control_Description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.
ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast_Descriptio: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 60%% of Ogre Magi's current mana.
riki_blink_strike_Note2: You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.
spectre_dispersion_Description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica_Note0: Doesn't create illusions from other illusions, or Meepo clones.
kunkka_tidebringer_Note1: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
omniknight_purification_Description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
doom_bringer_infernal_blade_Lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
undying_tombstone_zombie_deathstrike_Des: Slows enemy units on attack.  If the attacked unit's health goes below the threshold, the zombie receives enhanced movement and attack speed.
jakiro_ice_path_Description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
doom_bringer_devour_Note3: If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.
brewmaster_storm_dispel_magic_Descriptio: Damages summoned units in an area and purges most buffs or debuffs.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lycan_howl_Lore: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.
slardar_amplify_damage_Description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.
ursa_earthshock_Lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
ogre_magi_ignite_Description: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
pugna_life_drain_Note1: Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.
undying_soul_rip_Description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
ursa_enrage_aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
disruptor_thunder_strike_Lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.
dragon_knight_dragon_blood_Lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
riki_smoke_screen_Note0: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
tiny_craggy_exterior_Lore: Melee warriors tend to find attacking the Stone Giant largely ineffective.
tiny_avalanche_Lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.
phoenix_supernova_Description:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After %tooltip_duration% seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
death_prophet_carrion_swarm_Note0: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast_Lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot_Note0: If the target becomes Spell Immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration.
brewmaster_storm_cyclone_Description: Encloses a unit in a tornado, removing it from the battlefield.
monkey_king_tree_dance_Description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Note2: The instant kill doesn't work on illusions.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form_Lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
silencer_curse_of_the_silent_Lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
puck_ethereal_jaunt_Description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_Descript: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast_Lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
ogre_magi_bloodlust_Note2: Can be cast on Spell Immune allies.
storm_spirit_static_remnant_Note1: Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
omniknight_degen_aura_Note0: Does not affect Spell Immune units.
keeper_of_the_light_recall_Description: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.
skeleton_king_reincarnation_aghanim_desc: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Note0: The area of effect is 275 + 50*TimeTraveled, capped at 1000.  The freeze area along the path is 275.
drow_ranger_frost_arrows_Description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts %frost_arrows_hero_duration_tooltip% seconds on Heroes, and %frost_arrows_creep_duration% seconds on creeps.\n\nFrost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
chen_hand_of_god_Description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_Description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
furion_sprout_Lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
pudge_rot_Lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
bristleback_bristleback_Note0: Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back.
jakiro_liquid_fire_Description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.
dazzle_poison_touch_Lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
elder_titan_natural_order_spirit_Lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
templar_assassin_refraction_Lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
clinkz_death_pact_Note1: Increases Clinkz' current and max HP.
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage_Lore: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
arc_warden_magnetic_field_Description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
omniknight_repel_Note0: Repel acts the same as other sources of spell immunity, and cannot be purged.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap_Lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
bounty_hunter_track_Description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage_Note0: The bash stun goes through spell immunity.
terrorblade_reflection_Lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike_Lore: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.
naga_siren_mirror_image_Lore: Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.
tusk_snowball_Description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a %snowball_grab_radius% radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
chen_hand_of_god_Lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
undying_decay_Lore: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.
antimage_blink_Description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
warlock_fatal_bonds_Note0: Damage will not disable abilities or items like Blink Dagger which require player based damage.
bloodseeker_thirst_Note2: Affects linger for 2 seconds if a target dies.
windrunner_shackleshot_Lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
sniper_take_aim_Lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.
bloodseeker_rupture_aghanim_description: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 seconds replenish time.
tusk_launch_snowball_Note3: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
troll_warlord_battle_trance_Description: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.
lion_voodoo_Note1: The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
furion_teleportation_Lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
gyrocopter_homing_missile_Description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness_Descri: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
lich_frost_armor_Description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.
terrorblade_conjure_image_Lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
lone_druid_true_form_battle_cry_Descript: Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.
enigma_demonic_conversion_Note0: Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.
lone_druid_true_form_battle_cry_Lore: When Sylla cries in the forest, the reverberations are felt for a great distance.
magnataur_reverse_polarity_Description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
broodmother_incapacitating_bite_Lore: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
undying_tombstone_Description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
tidehunter_gush_Description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_entangle_Note0: Entangled units can't use Blink abilities, and are revealed if they are invisible.
drow_ranger_marksmanship_Lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
phoenix_sun_ray_Description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
wisp_overcharge_Lore: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
earthshaker_aftershock_Description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
monkey_king_untransform_Description: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.
pugna_nether_ward_Lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast_Description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
pugna_nether_blast_Description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
lone_druid_spirit_bear_Note2: Using Hand of Midas from Spirit Bear grants the earned XP to Lone Druid.
batrider_flaming_lasso_Note2: Disable works on Spell Immune units.
rubick_telekinesis_Note1: When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain_Note1: Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.
nevermore_necromastery_Lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
shadow_demon_demonic_purge_Description:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
alchemist_chemical_rage_Note0: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.
slark_pounce_Note0: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance.
tiny_grow_aghanim_description: Allows Tiny to equip a tree, increasing his attack range, damage versus buildings, and granting a cleave attack.  Improves Tossed unit damage.
terrorblade_metamorphosis_Description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within %metamorph_aura_tooltip% range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
phoenix_fire_spirits_Description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
queenofpain_blink_Description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
tidehunter_kraken_shell_Note0: Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards buff removal.
brewmaster_drunken_haze_Description: Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.
bane_fiends_grip_aghanim_description: Increases damage per second, mana drain, and duration. If an enemy tries to attack Bane while he is channeling Fiend's Grip, they will instantly have Bane's current level of Nightmare inflicted upon them.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth_Note0: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.
faceless_void_chronosphere_Lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
slardar_sprint_Description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.
nevermore_requiem_Description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
viper_nethertoxin_Lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse_Lore: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.
bristleback_warpath_Note0: Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses.
bristleback_bristleback_Lore: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
luna_eclipse_Note2: Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun.
lycan_summon_wolves_Description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Cripple, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.
broodmother_poison_sting_Description: Poisons and slows enemies with each attack.
bristleback_quill_spray_Note0: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
skeleton_king_reincarnation_Note2: Revives with full HP and Mana.
phantom_assassin_blur_Description: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
batrider_firefly_Description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.
death_prophet_exorcism_Note0: Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
special_bonus_unique_lich_2: Attacks Apply 30% MS and AS Slow
obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura_Note0: Other than Arcane Orb, most skills without cooldowns cannot trigger Essence Aura.
techies_stasis_trap_Description: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.
item_monkey_king_bar_Lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
juggernaut_blade_fury_Note0: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units.
lycan_summon_wolves_Note1: Spirit Wolves have 80% magic damage resistance.
techies_land_mines_Note3: Mines are triggered by invisible units.
spectre_haunt_Note1: There is a 1 second delay before illusions start attacking their target.
abaddon_borrowed_time_Description:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below %hp_threshold%.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
bounty_hunter_track_Note2: The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold.
nyx_assassin_burrow_Description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_Note0: Units affected by Song of the Siren are invulnerable and cannot take damage from any source.
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo_aghanim_de: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range.
centaur_return_Lore: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.
venomancer_poison_sting_Lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
slardar_slithereen_crush_Lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
jakiro_macropyre_aghanim_description: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.
luna_moon_glaive_Description: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
invoker_wex_Description: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Each <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
batrider_firefly_Note2: The trail persists through Batrider's death.
storm_spirit_ball_lightning_Note2: Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.
kunkka_torrent_Description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
chaos_knight_phantasm_Description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50%% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal full damage, but take double damage.

Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
viper_viper_strike_aghanim_description: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.
lich_frost_nova_Lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
lina_fiery_soul_Note1: Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
axe_counter_helix_Description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
lich_chain_frost_Note3: Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.
techies_land_mines_Note5: Grants 30 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
wisp_relocate_Lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
razor_plasma_field_Description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.
morphling_morph_str_Lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
witch_doctor_death_ward_Lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
invoker_chaos_meteor_Note1: The meteor moves at a speed of 300.
wisp_relocate_Note0: Enemies receive a visual indicator in the world and on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_cancel_Desc: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.
gyrocopter_flak_cannon_Description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.
tidehunter_anchor_smash_Description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace_Descripti: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
sven_storm_bolt_Description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
furion_sprout_Description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
bane_enfeeble_Lore: Even the mightiest of warriors crumble before the terror of Atropos.
windrunner_windrun_Lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
magnataur_reverse_polarity_Note0: Disable and pull work through spell immunity.
dark_troll_warlord_ensnare_Description: The Dark Troll Summoner tosses netting around an enemy's feet, briefly immobilizing the unit, though the unit can still attack and use abilities. Interrupts channeling abilities.
morphling_adaptive_strike_Lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
venomancer_poison_sting_Description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.
earthshaker_echo_slam_Note0: Will not damage ethereal units, such as those in Ghost Form.
storm_spirit_ball_lightning_Note0: Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling.
sven_warcry_Lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
tiny_grow_Lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.
abaddon_frostmourne_Description: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.
meepo_divided_we_stand_Note0: Clones can't use Arcane Boots or pick up runes.
life_stealer_assimilate_Description: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
gyrocopter_homing_missile_Note0: Towers do half damage to the missile.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_Lore: Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.
monkey_king_wukongs_command_Note0: Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
beastmaster_inner_beast_Lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb_Descriptio: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals %int_steal% intelligence for %int_steal_duration% seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.\n\nArcane Orb is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
necrolyte_death_pulse_Description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units. Passively provides regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.
medusa_mystic_snake_Lore: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.
rattletrap_hookshot_Lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
axe_battle_hunger_Note0: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder_Lore: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
huskar_life_break_Lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
enchantress_untouchable_Note1: The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.
invoker_empty1_Description: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
batrider_flamebreak_Description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
silencer_last_word_Description: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.
venomancer_poison_nova_Lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
batrider_flamebreak_Lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
zuus_static_field_Note0: The damage from Static Field is dealt before the damage from the used spell.
razor_static_link_Description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.
doom_bringer_devour_Lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe_Note0: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.
dark_seer_vacuum_Note3: Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.
broodmother_insatiable_hunger_Lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
leshrac_split_earth_Note1: There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.
queenofpain_sonic_wave_Description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lina_dragon_slave_Note0: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.
wisp_tether_Lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
crystal_maiden_frostbite_Lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
huskar_inner_vitality_Lore: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
faceless_void_chronosphere_Note1: Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.
terrorblade_reflection_Note1: Reflections can only attack their source.
dragon_knight_dragon_blood_Description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
earth_spirit_petrify_Description: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.
alchemist_unstable_concoction_Note4: Once thrown, Unstable Concoction stops brewing.
bloodseeker_blood_bath_Description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After %delay_plus_castpoint_tooltip% seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
furion_force_of_nature_Description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have %treant_health_tooltip% health and deal %treant_min_dmg_tooltip%-%treant_max_dmg_tooltip% damage.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch_Note0: Extra damage is its own instance of damage.
furion_wrath_of_nature_Description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
wisp_overcharge_Description: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
lich_chain_frost_aghanim_description: Increases damage and casting range. Removes the limit on the number of times Chain Frost can jump.
life_stealer_infest_Note3: Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.
night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night_Descri: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
axe_berserkers_call_Description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
wisp_tether_Note1: The tethered unit will heal 50% faster.
jakiro_liquid_fire_Note0: Works on both units and buildings.
